title: Thick Thighs Oh My
itunes:title: Thick Thighs Oh My
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have a problem with meeting men and when I do meet them, they can’t handle a woman like me. I’m 34 years old and I’m 5’7” with a body like Cardi B. It’s all natural but since women started getting their bodies done, I get lumped into that category when I meet men. I don’t feel that I should have to explain my body type, but nowadays men come right out and ask if my behind is real..............................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
